# 常用js-api

# base64 转换

# btoa 明文转密；atob 密转明文

window.btoa('shenxiaoyu')
"c2hlbnhpYW95dQ=="

window.atob("c2hlbnhpYW95dQ==")
"shenxiaoyu"

# Unicode 转换

# window.encodeURIComponent

# window.decodeURIComponent

window.encodeURIComponent(a)
"zg%20%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD"

window.decodeURIComponent("zg%20%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD")
"zg 中国"

数组方法 →
